name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Smart Bookmarks: chat with your bookmarks

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with everything, everywhere, all at once! Curate and access your personalized knowledge base with the smart bookmarking…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat with everything, everywhere, all at once! Curate and access your personalized knowledge base with the smart bookmarking extension. Just like an ordinary bookmark extension, you can bookmark anything online (link or pdf), and organize it in a beautiful UI. But off course, it isn’t just an ordinary bookmarking tool. You can search bookmarks and even chat with it when looking for relevant information from your knowledge base. You can choose to chat with all of your bookmarks or select specific bookmarks to chat with.
